uid.description: The unique identifier of the OnlineProfile entity

business_uid.description: The unique identifier of the Business entity

supported_languages.description: List of language codes supported by the business's online profile. Null indicates nothing was selected

created_at.description: Timestamp when the OnlineProfile entity was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the OnlineProfile entity was last updated

description: Defines the online profile for a business
